I was so amazed seeing the temple. It's so wonderful. It's Hindu-Buddhist temple. It's was

about the history of th temple. The guide ,Mr Tom explained evey single thing about the temple
very clearly and detail. I also took several pictures in the temple.Beside I get knowledgeabout
Borobudur temple.I enjoy the view.It's was my that I will never forget.

related_questions.question: The shop...late yesterday a. closed B. close C closes d. closing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. closed

Penjelasan:

Kenapa yang closed? Karena disitu udah ada kata yesterday yang dimana artinya kemarin sehingga harus menggunakan Past Tense yang dimana past tense ini verbnya (kata kerja) menggunakan bentuk kedua.

related_questions.question: Suatu segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisinya a 8 cm dan b 15 cm panjang sisi c nya adalah​

answers.answer:
Penjelasan:

Segitiga siku-siku adalah segitiga yang besar sudut pada sisi tegak lurusnya adalah 90°. Pada segitiga siku-siku berlaku teorema Pythagoras yang berbunyi besar kuadrat sisi miringnya sama dengan jumlah kuadrat dua sisi siku-sikunya.

Ingat!!!

Rumus teorema Pythagoras

c² = a² + b²

Diketahui:

panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm

panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Ditanya: berapa panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku tersebut?

Jawab:

Pada soal diketahui panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm dan panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Maka penyelesaian dari soal di atas menggunakan teorema Pythagoras.

c² = a² + b²

c² = (15 cm)² + (8 cm)²

c² = 225 cm² + 64 cm²

c² = 289 cm²

c = √(289 cm²) = 17 cm

Jadi, panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisi siku-sikunya 15 cm dan 8 cm adalah 17 cm.

Teorema Phytagoras =

  • [tex] \sqrt{ {8}^{2} } + {15}^{2} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{64 + 225} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{289} = [/tex]
  • 17 cm
  • Jadi, panjang c ( sisi miring ) = 17 cm

Semoga membantu.. Jangan dihapus jawaban saya... =)

related_questions.question: When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

Penjelasan:

Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Passive dari Simple Past Tense:

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

students in this school clean all the part of their school to face the Independence day.

b. Our

headmaster gives punishment to the students who don't wear uniform.


Bantu jawab kak. jgn ngasal ya kakk​

answers.answer:
All the students in this school cleaned all the part of their school to face the independence day

Our headmaster gave punishment to the students who did not wear uniform

a. All the students cleaned all the part of their school to faced the independence day.

b. Our headmaster gave punishment to the students who didn't wear uniform.
